Incipet benefits

Care means more than coverage

Community of Pup Parents

We pay a small, fixed amount every month. This builds our shared healthcare fund to care for our pups, when they need it most

Health Risk Management Portal

Understand your dog’s health risks and when they are most likely to strike, so we can prevent them from striking too soon

Instant Booking System with Pros

Book top-notch vets, walkers, groomers, sitters, holistic specialists, and more with a simple click

Virtual Consultations and Check-Ups

Have a concern? No need to leave the house. Virtual meetings with Vets and other Pros for accessible care

Tailored Wellness Plan for a Healthier Pup

Get a custom wellness plan to lower the risk of your dog’s conditions developing prematurely
